original_text: “Then the king of the south shall be strong, but one of his princes shall be stronger than he and shall rule, and his authority shall be a great authority.
korean_text: 남방의 왕들은 강할 것이나 그 군주들 중 하나는 그보다 강하여 권세를 떨치리니 그의 권세가 심히 클 것이요

sentences.original_text: Then the king of the south shall be strong
but one of his princes shall be stronger than he
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 군주 중 한 사람은 그보다 더 강할 것이며

sentences.original_text: and his authority shall be a great authority
